system.description: Intense localized tremor. For 1 round creatures on ground cannot move or attack; casters must Concentration check DC 20+spell level or lose spell. Effects by terrain: cave/tunnel collapse (8d6 damage, pinning); cliff landslide; open ground Reflex 15 or fall, 25% fall in fissure (Reflex 20 to avoid); structure 100 damage; river/marsh becomes quicksand. Pinned creatures take 1d6 nonlethal/min.
